name: Your Life Is Currency (nanocube75)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 44 and submitted for the jam category

A fun, fast-paced and quirky game! Where- you guessed it! You use your own life to purchase upgrades. I don't have to much else too say... Give it a go!

Controls: W.S.A.D, Mouse to aim, right click to fire and left click to purchase upgrades.
